channel.title: I need to know how to fix the drop glitch plz!
channel.description:
i need to know how to fix the drop glitch plz!!!!
if i added a monster drop, and i kill the monsters, than it or dc's me. or it doesn't show the drop.. anyone know how to fix that the drop is showing?
